skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: infiniti
des:
Use your voice to open a new dimension of connectivity between you and your equipped vehicle with the available INFINITI Skill for Amazon Alexa. You can now access your INFINITI using just your voice, giving you confidence and convenience right from your home. 

Forgot to secure your vehicle? Looking to remotely start your INFINITI vehicle to return the cabin to a comfortable temperature before you get in? The INFINITI Skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to connect with and control your INFINITI as quickly and easily as having a conversation.

COMPATIBLE VEHICLES 

The INFINITI Skill is compatible with select INFINITI vehicles MY18 and newer.*

Please note that feature availability varies by model, year, trim level, packaging, and options; not all equipped vehicles are able to access all features. For a complete list of available features for your specific vehicle, please visit www.infinitiusa.com/intouch/system-availability. 

If you own a Nissan vehicle that is equipped with this feature, please link to the Nissan Skill for Alexa.

SETUP 

1. Download and open the Amazon Alexa app on your smartphone. 
2. Enable the INFINITI Skill. 
3. Log in to the INFINITI Skill with your MyINFINITI username and password to link your account. 

ASK ALEXA*
- “Alexa, start my Q50.”
- “Alexa, lock the doors of my Q60.” 
- “Alexa, ask INFINITI to honk the horn of my QX60.” 
- “Alexa, ask INFINITI to flash the lights of my Q50.” 
- “Alexa, ask INFINITI to turn on my boundary/speed/curfew/valet alert.”
- "Alexa, ask INFINITI to tell me my odometer reading of my QX60." 
- "Alexa, ask INFINITI to get my distance to empty of my QX55."
- "Alexa, ask INFINITI to get my tire pressure of my QX80."

For a full list of what you can do with the INFINITI Skill for Amazon Alexa, please visit https://www.infinitiusa.com/intouch/features-apps/intouch-amazon-alexa-skill. 

REQUIREMENTS 
This skill requires an active subscription to the INFINITI InTouch Services Select package, which is included with the purchase of a new, compatible INFINITI vehicle. To access or start your subscription, visit owners.nissanusa.com. A security Voice PIN code is also required to use some remote features. When initiating a remote command, you will be prompted to say the “Voice” code, which is the same PIN code that can be set up in the INFINITI InTouch Services app. To enroll in INFINITI InTouch Services or set/reset your Voice PIN code, download the INFINITI InTouch Services app or visit owners.infinitiusa.com. 

SUPPORT

For support, call our INFINITI InTouch customer support agents at 1-855-444-7244, Monday through Saturday, 8 AM to 10:00 PM Eastern Time.

For important safety information, system limitations, and additional operating and feature information, see dealer, owner’s manual, or www.infinitiusa.com/intouch/legal. 

*The INFINITI InTouch Services telematics program was affected by AT&T’s decision to discontinue its 3G cellular network. As of February 22, 2022, all INFINITI vehicles equipped with telematics hardware compatible for use with the 3G cellular network will be unable to connect to the 3G network and unable to access the INFINITI InTouch Services features. Clients having purchased an INFINITI vehicle with this type of hardware must have enrolled in INFINITI InTouch Services prior to June 1, 2021 to activate the service to have received access through February 22, 2022 (access is subject to cellular network availability and coverage limitations). For more information, please visit http://www.infinitiusa.com/connect/support-faqs.

Privacy policy: https://www.infinitiusa.com/intouch/privacy
